name: Initialize Vite React TypeScript Project
description: Create a new Vite project with React 18+ and TypeScript template, ensuring proper configuration for modern development
steps: Verify package.json exists with react, react-dom, and typescript dependencies
Verify vite.config.ts exists with React plugin configured
Verify tsconfig.json exists with strict mode enabled
Verify src/main.tsx exists as the entry point
Run npm install successfully without errors
Run npm run dev and verify development server starts

name: Install and Configure Tailwind CSS
description: Set up Tailwind CSS following official documentation with PostCSS configuration
steps: Verify tailwindcss, postcss, and autoprefixer are in devDependencies
Verify tailwind.config.js exists with content paths configured
Verify postcss.config.js exists with tailwind and autoprefixer plugins
Verify src/index.css contains Tailwind directives (@tailwind base, components, utilities)
Verify Tailwind classes render correctly in a test component

name: Install and Configure Shadcn UI
description: Set up Shadcn UI component library with proper configuration for the project
steps: Verify components.json exists with Shadcn configuration
Verify src/components/ui directory exists for Shadcn components
Verify src/lib/utils.ts exists with cn utility function
Verify CSS variables are configured in index.css for theming
Verify at least one Shadcn component can be imported and rendered

name: Configure React Router
description: Set up React Router with routes for home (/) and favorites (/favorites) pages
steps: Verify react-router-dom is in dependencies
Verify BrowserRouter wraps the App component in main.tsx
Verify Routes component contains Route for / path
Verify Routes component contains Route for /favorites path
Navigate to / and verify home page renders
Navigate to /favorites and verify favorites page renders

name: Create Environment Configuration
description: Set up environment variable handling for TMDB API key with example file
steps: Verify .env.example file exists with VITE_TMDB_API_KEY placeholder
Verify .gitignore includes .env file
Verify environment variable can be accessed via import.meta.env.VITE_TMDB_API_KEY
Document API key setup instructions in .env.example

name: Create TMDB API Service Module
description: Create a service module for making TMDB API calls with proper typing
steps: Verify src/services/tmdb.ts or similar file exists
Verify TypeScript interfaces for Movie and API response types are defined
Verify function to search movies by query exists
Verify function to fetch trending/popular movies exists
Verify API base URL and key are properly configured
Verify proper error handling in API functions

name: Create Local Storage Favorites Service
description: Create a service module for managing favorites in browser Local Storage
steps: Verify favorites service file exists (e.g., src/services/favorites.ts)
Verify function to get all favorites from localStorage exists
Verify function to add a movie to favorites exists
Verify function to remove a movie from favorites exists
Verify function to check if a movie is favorited exists
Verify favorites persist after page refresh

name: Create App Root Component with Router
description: Set up the main App component with routing structure and layout
steps: Verify App.tsx exists with proper component structure
Verify App component renders Header component
Verify App component renders Routes with Outlet or route elements
Verify main content area has proper container styling
Verify App passes favorites state down to child components

name: Configure Dark Theme Base Styles
description: Set up dark theme CSS variables and base styling with amber/gold accents
steps: Verify dark background color is applied to body/html (e.g., slate-900 or similar)
Verify text color defaults to light color for readability
Verify amber/gold accent color variables are defined
Verify Shadcn theme variables are configured for dark mode
Verify no white flash on page load

name: Create Page Components Shell
description: Create basic shell components for Home and Favorites pages
steps: Verify src/pages/HomePage.tsx or similar exists
Verify src/pages/FavoritesPage.tsx or similar exists
Verify HomePage renders without errors
Verify FavoritesPage renders without errors
Verify pages accept necessary props for state management

name: Create Fixed Header Component
description: Build a fixed header that stays at the top of the viewport during scroll
steps: Verify Header component exists in src/components
Verify header has position fixed and full width
Verify header stays visible when scrolling down the page
Verify header has appropriate z-index to stay above content
Verify main content has top padding/margin to account for fixed header

name: Add App Logo and Title to Header
description: Display application logo/title on the left side of the header
steps: Verify logo or app title is visible in header
Verify logo/title is positioned on the left side
Verify logo/title uses amber/gold accent color
Verify clicking logo navigates to home page
Verify logo has appropriate sizing and styling

name: Add Navigation Links to Header
description: Create navigation links for Search (home) and Favorites pages in header
steps: Verify Search/Home link exists in header navigation
Verify Favorites link exists in header navigation
Verify Search link navigates to / route
Verify Favorites link navigates to /favorites route
Verify navigation links are properly spaced and styled

name: Style Active Navigation Link
description: Apply visual distinction to the currently active navigation link
steps: Verify active nav link has different styling than inactive links
Verify active state uses amber/gold accent color or underline
Verify active state updates when navigating between pages
Verify Search link shows active on / route
Verify Favorites link shows active on /favorites route

name: Add Favorites Count Badge to Header
description: Display a badge showing the number of favorited movies next to Favorites link
steps: Verify badge appears near Favorites navigation link
Verify badge displays correct count of favorited movies
Verify badge updates when favorites are added or removed
Verify badge shows 0 or is hidden when no favorites exist
Verify badge has contrasting background for visibility

name: Style Header for Dark Theme
description: Apply dark theme styling to header with proper contrast and shadows
steps: Verify header has dark background color
Verify header text is light colored for contrast
Verify header has subtle bottom border or shadow
Verify header maintains amber/gold accent theme
Verify header looks cohesive with overall dark design

name: Create Search Input Component
description: Build a search input field for entering movie search queries
steps: Verify search input exists on home page
Verify input has placeholder text like Search movies...
Verify input value is controlled by React state
Verify input accepts keyboard input
Verify input has proper styling for dark theme

name: Trigger Search on Enter Key
description: Execute movie search when user presses Enter key in search input
steps: Type a movie name in search input
Press Enter key
Verify search function is called with input value
Verify search does not trigger on other key presses
Verify empty search input does not trigger API call

name: Fetch and Display Search Results
description: Call TMDB search API and display matching movies in results area
steps: Enter a search query and press Enter
Verify API call is made to TMDB search endpoint
Verify search results are displayed after API response
Verify multiple movies are shown for broad search terms
Verify results match the search query

name: Display Loading State During Search
description: Show loading indicator while search API request is in progress
steps: Initiate a search
Verify loading indicator appears while waiting for response
Verify loading indicator disappears when results load
Verify loading state prevents multiple simultaneous searches
Verify loading indicator is visually appropriate for dark theme

name: Display Empty Search Results Message
description: Show appropriate message when search returns no results
steps: Search for a query that returns no results (e.g., xyznonexistent123)
Verify message No movies found. Try a different search term. appears
Verify empty state is styled appropriately
Verify user can initiate a new search from empty state

name: Handle Search API Errors
description: Display user-friendly error message when search API fails
steps: Simulate API error (invalid key or network issue)
Verify error message is displayed to user
Verify error message is helpful and not technical
Verify user can retry search after error
Verify error state clears on successful search

name: Fetch Trending Movies on Page Load
description: Automatically load trending/popular movies when home page first loads
steps: Navigate to home page
Verify trending movies API is called on mount
Verify trending movies are displayed in grid
Verify trending movies load without user interaction
Verify loading state shows while fetching

name: Create Movie Card Component
description: Build reusable movie card component for displaying movie information
steps: Verify MovieCard component exists
Verify component accepts movie data as props
Verify component renders without errors
Verify component has proper TypeScript typing
Verify component is used in both search results and favorites

name: Display Movie Poster Image
description: Show movie poster image on card fetched from TMDB image URL
steps: Verify poster image is displayed on movie card
Verify image uses correct TMDB image base URL
Verify image has appropriate size (w342 or w500)
Verify image has alt text for accessibility
Verify image loads correctly from TMDB CDN

name: Display Movie Title on Card
description: Show movie title prominently on the movie card
steps: Verify movie title is displayed on card
Verify title is readable and properly sized
Verify long titles are truncated or wrapped appropriately
Verify title has good contrast on dark background

name: Display Movie Release Date
description: Show the full release date on each movie card
steps: Verify release date is displayed on movie card
Verify date format is human-readable (e.g., January 15, 2024)
Verify date is positioned consistently on cards
Verify missing dates are handled gracefully

name: Display Movie Rating
description: Show movie rating score on the card (numeric or star format)
steps: Verify rating is displayed on movie card
Verify rating shows TMDB vote_average value
Verify rating is formatted appropriately (e.g., 7.5/10 or stars)
Verify rating uses amber/gold color for visual accent
Verify movies without ratings show appropriate fallback

name: Add Favorite Heart Icon to Card
description: Display clickable heart icon on movie card for favoriting
steps: Verify heart icon is visible on movie card
Verify heart icon is clickable
Verify heart icon has hover state
Verify heart icon is positioned consistently (e.g., top-right corner)
Verify heart icon is accessible via keyboard

name: Show Outlined Heart for Non-Favorited Movies
description: Display outlined/empty heart icon when movie is not in favorites
steps: View a movie that is not favorited
Verify heart icon appears as outline only
Verify heart color is appropriate for dark theme
Verify outlined state is visually distinct from filled

name: Show Filled Red Heart for Favorited Movies
description: Display filled red heart icon when movie is in favorites list
steps: View a movie that is in favorites
Verify heart icon appears filled with red color
Verify filled state is clearly distinguishable from outline
Verify heart updates to filled when movie is added to favorites

name: Display Placeholder for Missing Posters
description: Show placeholder image when movie poster is not available
steps: Find a movie with null or missing poster_path
Verify placeholder image is displayed instead of broken image
Verify placeholder has appropriate styling
Verify placeholder maintains card layout consistency

name: Add Hover Effects to Movie Cards
description: Apply visual feedback when user hovers over movie card
steps: Hover mouse over a movie card
Verify card has visual change (scale, shadow, or border)
Verify hover effect is smooth with transition
Verify hover effect works consistently across all cards

name: Style Movie Card with Shadow and Elevation
description: Apply elevated card style with shadow for depth perception
steps: Verify movie cards have shadow effect
Verify shadow is visible against dark background
Verify cards appear elevated above background
Verify shadow intensity is appropriate for design

name: Create Responsive Movie Grid Layout
description: Build responsive grid that adjusts columns based on screen width
steps: View grid on large desktop screen
Verify 4 columns of cards are displayed
Resize to tablet width
Verify 3 columns are displayed
Resize to mobile width
Verify 2 columns are displayed

name: Add Consistent Grid Spacing
description: Apply uniform gaps between movie cards in grid
steps: Verify consistent horizontal spacing between cards
Verify consistent vertical spacing between rows
Verify spacing is maintained at all screen sizes
Verify spacing uses appropriate Tailwind gap utilities

name: Create Pagination Component
description: Build pagination controls for navigating through search results
steps: Verify Pagination component exists
Verify component accepts current page and total pages props
Verify component renders page numbers
Verify component has previous and next buttons
Verify component calls callback on page change

name: Display Page Numbers in Pagination
description: Show clickable page numbers for direct navigation
steps: Perform search with many results
Verify page numbers are displayed
Click on page number
Verify results update to that page
Verify clicked page becomes current

name: Add Previous Page Button
description: Include button to navigate to the previous page of results
steps: Navigate to page 2 of results
Click Previous button
Verify page changes to 1
Verify results update to page 1 content

name: Add Next Page Button
description: Include button to navigate to the next page of results
steps: View page 1 of multi-page results
Click Next button
Verify page changes to 2
Verify results update to page 2 content

name: Highlight Current Page Number
description: Apply distinct styling to indicate the current active page
steps: View pagination with multiple pages
Verify current page number has different styling
Verify current page uses amber/gold accent color
Navigate to different page
Verify highlight moves to new current page

name: Disable Previous Button on First Page
description: Prevent Previous button click when on page 1
steps: Navigate to page 1 of results
Verify Previous button is disabled or hidden
Verify clicking disabled button has no effect
Navigate to page 2
Verify Previous button becomes enabled

name: Disable Next Button on Last Page
description: Prevent Next button click when on final page of results
steps: Navigate to the last page of results
Verify Next button is disabled or hidden
Verify clicking disabled button has no effect
Navigate to previous page
Verify Next button becomes enabled

name: Hide Pagination for Single Page Results
description: Do not show pagination when results fit on one page
steps: Perform search with few results (single page)
Verify pagination is not displayed
Perform search with many results
Verify pagination appears

name: Toggle Add Movie to Favorites
description: Add movie to favorites when clicking heart on non-favorited movie
steps: Find a movie not in favorites
Click the heart icon
Verify movie is added to favorites
Verify heart icon changes to filled red
Verify header favorites count increases

name: Toggle Remove Movie from Favorites
description: Remove movie from favorites when clicking heart on favorited movie
steps: Find a movie in favorites
Click the filled heart icon
Verify movie is removed from favorites
Verify heart icon changes to outline
Verify header favorites count decreases

name: Persist Favorites to Local Storage
description: Save favorites array to localStorage whenever it changes
steps: Add a movie to favorites
Open browser developer tools
Check localStorage for favorites key
Verify movie data is stored in localStorage
Remove movie and verify localStorage updates

name: Load Favorites from Local Storage on Init
description: Restore favorites from localStorage when application starts
steps: Add several movies to favorites
Refresh the page
Verify favorites are restored
Verify header badge shows correct count
Verify heart icons show filled state for favorited movies

name: Display Favorites on Favorites Page
description: Show all favorited movies in grid on /favorites route
steps: Add several movies to favorites
Navigate to /favorites page
Verify all favorited movies are displayed
Verify movies appear in same card format as search results
Verify grid layout is consistent with home page

name: Show Empty State on Favorites Page
description: Display helpful message when user has no favorites
steps: Remove all favorites
Navigate to /favorites page
Verify empty state message is displayed
Verify message suggests adding favorites
Verify link or button to go to search exists

name: Remove Favorites from Favorites Page
description: Allow unfavoriting movies directly from favorites page
steps: Navigate to /favorites with some favorites
Click heart icon on a favorited movie
Verify movie is removed from favorites list
Verify movie disappears from favorites page
Verify header count updates

name: Preserve Search Query in State
description: Maintain search query when navigating away and back
steps: Enter a search query and search
Navigate to /favorites page
Navigate back to home page
Verify search input still shows previous query
Verify search results are still displayed

name: Preserve Current Page in State
description: Maintain pagination position when navigating away and back
steps: Search and navigate to page 3
Navigate to /favorites
Navigate back to home
Verify page 3 is still selected
Verify page 3 results are displayed

name: Style Search Input for Dark Theme
description: Apply dark theme styling to search input with proper contrast
steps: Verify search input has dark background
Verify input text is light colored
Verify placeholder text is visible but muted
Verify input border or focus ring uses accent color
Verify input is visually prominent on page

name: Style Buttons for Dark Theme
description: Apply consistent dark theme styling to all buttons
steps: Verify pagination buttons have dark theme styling
Verify buttons have appropriate hover states
Verify disabled buttons are visually distinct
Verify amber/gold accent is used appropriately

name: Apply Amber Gold Accent Throughout
description: Ensure amber/gold accent color is used consistently for interactive elements
steps: Verify active nav link uses amber/gold
Verify ratings use amber/gold color
Verify current page number uses amber/gold
Verify focus states use amber/gold
Verify accent usage is consistent across app

name: Handle Network Error Gracefully
description: Display appropriate message when network is unavailable
steps: Disable network in browser dev tools
Attempt to search for movies
Verify user-friendly error message appears
Re-enable network
Verify search works again

name: Make Header Responsive for Mobile
description: Adjust header layout for smaller mobile screens
steps: View app on mobile width
Verify header elements do not overflow
Verify navigation is accessible on mobile
Verify logo and nav fit properly
Verify touch targets are adequately sized

name: Make Movie Cards Responsive
description: Ensure movie cards adapt properly to different screen sizes
steps: View movie cards on mobile width
Verify cards are readable and not cut off
Verify poster images scale appropriately
Verify text remains legible at all sizes
Verify touch targets for heart icon are adequate

name: Add Keyboard Navigation for Search
description: Ensure search functionality is fully keyboard accessible
steps: Tab to search input
Verify input receives focus with visible indicator
Type search query using keyboard
Press Enter to search
Verify results load successfully

name: Add Keyboard Navigation for Favorites
description: Ensure favorite toggle is keyboard accessible
steps: Tab to heart icon on movie card
Verify heart receives visible focus indicator
Press Enter or Space to toggle favorite
Verify favorite state changes
Verify screen reader announcement if possible

name: Add ARIA Labels for Accessibility
description: Include appropriate ARIA labels for screen readers
steps: Verify search input has aria-label
Verify heart buttons have aria-label indicating action
Verify navigation links have proper labels
Verify images have alt text
Test with screen reader if available

name: Direct URL Access to Favorites
description: Ensure /favorites route works when accessed directly
steps: Open browser to /favorites URL directly
Verify favorites page loads without errors
Verify favorites are loaded from localStorage
Verify header shows correct active state
Verify navigation works from this entry point
